channel.title: NMS:CSX on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:CSX on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: CSX Is Said to Work With Goldman Sachs to Explore Options
item.description: CSX Corp. is working with Goldman Sachs Group Inc., people familiar with the matter said, as the company explores options to participate in rail consolidation after two major rivals announced a merger
